current_instrument_status.comment: Uniformity optimised, was on lower side of specification on all four channels

instrument_status.comment: Uniformity optimised, was on lower side of specification on all four channels
Please could we have a uniformity and optics alignment check. Now on C72/158.
NaOH wash performed, all volumes primed ok
re-routed lines to vici, delivery now within spec
Unable to purge air from syringes and fluid lines even after several back flushes and washes on FCB.
Peltiers and chiller PCA replaced. Chiller cooling to correct temp.
Please could you check the chiller as running constantly at 16c. Now on 69/208.
NaOH wash performed, all volumes primed ok
laser interlocks dis-engaged. re-engaged and tested alignment, working correctly
Camera alignment problem at start of first base imaging.
RAID controller replaced with new. X/Y mapping checked and corrected. 1mm Y offset introduced.
NaOH washed by Mel, waste volumes correct
DIF file parameter changed as requested. Instrument ready to run.
PC settings need to be changed such that DIF files are copied across.
run B re-started. will monitor progress
RAID drive failure on D drive. Re-seated drive in PC and re-formatted. now functioing but data on FCA lost, unable to restart. Restarting FCB once new reagents avaialble from JB.

Multiple errors during run. Can not see where our run has got to, as unable to clear or open anything without generating more errors. A couple of them mention low memory but can not get my computer to open.Control software has disappeared but believe our run is somewhere near the end of R1. Please be aware production FCs on board.
Optics checked and all within spec. replaced syringe - now delivering fine.
Wavy intensities in Green laser, suspect uniformity issue. Runs now finished.
PC-Reimaged and adjusted flowcell mapping in the Y direction slightly. Instrument ready to run.
Two things please. Slot B pausing itself during runs due to PHX ParameterSet errors. And Slot A all T8 LH tiles on all lanes on any cycle show bluring. Now on C98/208.
HCS software to be upgraded to 1.3.8 before reloading

Optical bench inspected and no obvious issues found. Numerous optical installation tests run, all found to be within specification. Functional test run with closed end beaded flowcell, again all results within specification. Will monitor instrument.
Monitor arm also replaced with new due to counter balance mechanism failing.
Please could you check this instrument over as Run 05434 in Slot A had an intensity drop on C2 in lanes 2, 3 and 4 only. (badly so in G base top side). No on C160/200.
Next button greyed out due to flowcells not being loaded correctly. Re-loaded flowcells and run a wash recipe to prove operation. All ok.
Hi seq control window problem ''Next''button not highlighting.
1st wash, flowcell A under dipensed.. 55ml rather that 72ml. However, subsequent noah and last wash all volumes as expected.
